attributes.action: Scrap all the expenses claims from MPs and to build a purpuse built building for the MPs to use as an office and as accomodation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The idea is to stop the expenses of all MPs. This will be accomplished by having all MPs use a purpose built building/tower blocks for accommodation and office space, so that the costs can be accounted for without prejudice.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Scrap all the expenses claims from MPs and to build a purpuse built building for the MPs to use as an office and as accomodation."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21071
